data.title: Kailash Concepts
data.meta_description: Our close-knit team hails from academia and some of the world’s largest and most-respected investment firms.
data.text:
Bill is the Founding Partner of Kailash Concepts, LLC, a quantamental research platform that is structured to capitalize on world class quantitative expertise, market leading knowledge in behavioral finance intersected with fundamental analysis and oversight. Bill has over 30 years of experience in the Investment Industry.

Most recently, Bill has been head of partner relations for Kailash Concepts, LLC as a Managing Director at Baird and at Knight Capital where he co-founded Kailash Concepts. In addition, he is a former Senior Partner at Century Capital in Boston where he was Director of Research, Head of Business Development and Distribution with an emphasis on marketing to RIAs and Tier 1-3 Consultants.

Prior to Century Capital, Bill spent the bulk of his career at William Blair & Co in Chicago where he was the Head of Institutional Sales and Trading and a member of the firm’s Executive Committee. Bill’s career began as a CPA at Price Waterhouse in Cleveland Ohio. Bill is a graduate of John Carroll University with a BSBA in accounting.

Jim has 26 years of experience in the Investment Industry beginning at Hambrecht & Quist and having held senior equity sales roles at JP Morgan, Bear Stearns, Knight Capital and Baird. Jim has a proven track record of developing and fostering deep relationships while also creating, building and distributing unique and differentiated sell-side content. Jim received his BA from St. Mary’s College.

Jim lives in San Francisco, CA with his wife Jolene and three children: Santino, Gioberto and Lucia. Hobbies: Surfing, Skiing, Golfing, and Yoga.

Head of the Boston Region and has over 25 years experience in investments. Prior to Kailash Concepts, LLC Josh was a Managing Director and Head of Institutional equity Sales at Bank of America / Merrill Lynch. Josh has provided advisory services to Boston’s Institutional community for over 20 years.

Josh studied at Tabor Academy ’87, The University of London and Tufts University ‘91. Josh is also developing Mathnasium franchises in the Boston area helping students build their math skills and confidence. Josh lives in Needham MA with his wife Ricki and two sons Jack and George. Josh enjoys golf, boating, family time, socializing and markets of every type.

Jay Kreske is a Managing Director of Business Development at Kailash Concepts. Jay has over 25 years of experience serving institutional clients at major Wall Street firms, including J.P. Morgan, Deutsche Bank, and Mizuho Securities. Jay graduated with degrees in Finance and Marketing from the University of Wisconsin–Milwaukee and holds an MBA from The Booth School of Business at the University of Chicago.

Jay lives in Chicago with his wife, Jennifer, has three kids in college and enjoys building relationships, serving others and playing and watching sports.
